title: The Battle for Batley and Spen (with Tanmanjeet Singh Dhesi MP)
itunes:title: The Battle for Batley and Spen (with Tanmanjeet Singh Dhesi MP)
description:
Labour faces a big test in the by-election in Batley and Spen on Thursday, with the Tories seeming poised to take another Red Wall seat.

Tanmanjeet Singh Dhesi, Labour MP for Slough, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing his party is fighting hard to get its message over and make the voters aware the party represents all of their interests.

Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss the new government plans for state support for business, and a scheme to change the Covid rules for schools to avoid large numbers of pupils being absent from the classroom.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Labour faces a big test in the by-election in Batley and Spen on Thursday, with the Tories seeming poised to take another Red Wall seat.

Tanmanjeet Singh Dhesi, Labour MP for Slough, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing his party is fighting hard to get its message over and make the voters aware the party represents all of their interests.

Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss the new government plans for state support for business, and a scheme to change the Covid rules for schools to avoid large numbers of pupils being absent from the classroom.
